Hi Tarun

Thank you for your email and pictures

Unfortunately if the frame has been bent you would need to replace it

We would be able to supply a replacement OFI frame but you would need to find the company who installed all of the cladding as this is not a standard door but something that has been created to match the rest of the timber work

If a door defender was installed you would need to remove it every time you wanted to use the door to allow it open,if this was not removed beforehand you risk damaging the door/operator

Any questions please call

Kind regards

Paul Hollylee

Good Afternoon Mr Dundas

Thank you for your recent order of your new Novoroll garage door!

We are now offering some special pricing on some of their optional extras. I have included some of their more popular ones below but also reattached the brochure for you as well.

1 x Extra remote £60+VAT
Keypad £84+VAT
Rubber Hump £95+VAT
Wall switch £56+VAT

Kind regards,
Chris

Good Afternoon Mr Dundas,

I hope you are well!


Thank you for your reply. Essentially, these items are not required to the door for it to run but other customers do find them useful to have.

As a client who has recently put an order through with us, I thought I would reach out and see if any of the potential extras were of interest to you at a bit of a discounted rate as we can have them fitted on the same day as your installation when the time comes!

The keypad would be useful if you didn’t have a fob to hand and wanted to type in a code to open the door from the outside.

The wall switch would go on the inside of the garage but can be put anywhere in the garage as opposed to the internal wall unit which needs to be placed by the door. So for example, if you have a rear entrance, you can place the wall switch there so you can operate the door as you walk into the garage.

Lastly, the rubber hump goes along the ground and acts as a deterrent for any heavy weather entering the garage. So instead of the rubber touching the ground, it will go to the hump attached to the ground instead.

I hope this helps! If any of the above appeals to you, let me know and I will be more than happy to get these added on.

Kind Regards,

Chris
